placeholderImages.description: Our first meet together. The start of everything.
My silly face . Always try to  make you laugh.
Your silence started to hurt, but my love for you never wavered. Even when you ignored me, you remained my world.
Our first visit to the temple together. That's when we truly started to grow closer, feeling the warmth of each other's presence.
That moment when we were so close, and you kissed me... Time seemed to stop. My heart raced, and the whole world disappeared. It was pure magic, the sweetest moment I've ever felt.
placeholderImages.imageHint: our kiss and intimate connection always very special
